_comment: Thornhaven Village - 6 locations with 16 regions for LLM integration testing

locations.name: The Drowsy Dragon Inn
locations.description: A two-story timber-framed inn that has stood at the heart of Thornhaven for three generations. Warm light spills from its windows, and the smell of roasting meat drifts from its kitchens.
locations.atmosphere: Warm and welcoming, with the murmur of conversation and clinking tankards. A fire crackles in the hearth.

regions.name: Common Room
regions.description: The main gathering area with rough-hewn tables, a massive stone fireplace, and a bar counter polished smooth by countless elbows.
regions.atmosphere: Busy and warm, smelling of ale and wood smoke

regions.name: Private Booth
regions.description: A secluded alcove near the back, partially hidden by a moth-eaten curtain. Popular with those who prefer discrete conversations.
regions.atmosphere: Quiet and shadowy, muffling the tavern noise

regions.name: Kitchen
regions.description: A hot, cramped space filled with hanging pots, drying herbs, and the constant clatter of preparation.
regions.atmosphere: Steamy, fragrant with cooking spices, busy

locations.name: Ironforge Smithy
locations.description: A sturdy stone building with a perpetual plume of smoke rising from its chimney. The ring of hammer on anvil can be heard throughout the village.
locations.atmosphere: Hot and loud, the air thick with coal smoke and the smell of hot metal.

regions.name: Forge Floor
regions.description: The main work area dominated by a massive forge, anvil, and racks of tools. Half-finished weapons and horseshoes hang from hooks.
regions.atmosphere: Intensely hot, lit by forge-glow, rhythmic hammering

regions.name: Display Room
regions.description: A cooler front room where finished goods are displayed - everything from kitchen knives to decorative ironwork.

locations.name: Thornhaven Square
locations.description: The heart of the village, a cobblestone plaza surrounding an ancient well. Market stalls line the edges, and a weathered notice board stands near the well.
locations.atmosphere: Open and bustling during the day, quiet at night. The well's stones are worn smooth by generations of use.

regions.name: The Well
regions.description: An ancient stone well at the plaza's center, its walls carved with faded protective runes. Locals claim it has never run dry.
regions.atmosphere: Cool and slightly damp, the splash of water echoing

regions.name: Market Stalls
regions.description: A collection of wooden stalls selling everything from vegetables to trinkets. The arrangement changes with the seasons.
regions.atmosphere: Colorful, noisy, smells of fresh produce and spices

regions.name: Notice Board
regions.description: A weathered wooden board covered in notices, wanted posters, and the occasional love letter that was never delivered.
regions.atmosphere: Quiet corner, paper rustling in the breeze

locations.name: Temple of the Dawn
locations.description: A modest stone chapel dedicated to Lathander, its stained glass windows catching the morning sun. The building is old but well-maintained.
locations.atmosphere: Peaceful and reverent, smelling of incense and old books. Sunlight streams through colored glass.

regions.name: Sanctuary
regions.description: The main worship area with wooden pews facing a modest altar. Morning light creates patterns of color on the stone floor.
regions.atmosphere: Serene, dust motes floating in sunbeams, distant hymns

regions.name: Healing Chamber
regions.description: A small room with several cots, used to tend to the sick and injured. Herbs dry from the rafters.
regions.atmosphere: Clean, herbal scent, quiet and restful

locations.name: The Old Mill
locations.description: An abandoned watermill at the village edge, its wheel frozen and mossy. The villagers avoid it after dark, speaking of strange lights and sounds.
locations.atmosphere: Eerie and cold, with creaking timbers and the distant sound of water. Dust hangs in the air.

regions.name: Mill Floor
regions.description: The main grinding floor, now covered in dust and debris. The millstones sit silent, and old grain sacks rot in corners.
regions.atmosphere: Dusty, creaking wood, sense of abandonment

regions.name: Basement
regions.description: A dark cellar accessed by rotting stairs. Water seeps through the walls, and the sound of the stream is louder here.

regions.name: Miller's Quarters
regions.description: The former living space above the mill. Personal items remain scattered, as if the occupant left in a hurry.

locations.name: Thornhaven Road
locations.description: The main road running through the village, lined with cottages and small shops. Wagon ruts mark the packed earth.
locations.atmosphere: Open air, the sound of village life, occasional passing cart.

regions.name: Main Road
regions.description: The central thoroughfare, wide enough for two carts to pass. Cottages line both sides.
regions.atmosphere: Busy during day, quiet at night, packed earth underfoot

connections.description: The inn's front door opens onto the village square
The smithy entrance faces the main road
The square connects to the main road
The temple entrance faces the square
A dirt path leads from the road to the abandoned mill

region_connections.description: A curtained alcove in the back
A swinging door leads to the kitchen
An archway to the display room
The market stalls surround the well
The notice board stands near the well
A side door leads to the healing chamber
Rotting stairs descend to the basement
A ladder leads up to the miller's quarters
